website_summaries.verdict: A great, middle-of-the-road, queen air mattress. Some reviewers use it for daily use as their regular bed. Yes, there are some reports of leaking, but even the highest-end beds get the same complaints.
pros: So firm, you can sit on the edge to put on your shoes
Built-In, high-powered electric pump inflates mattress in approximately three minutes
Duffel bag included for easy storage and transportation
cons: Some reports of leaking and seams splitting

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I decided on this mattress after researching a BUNCH of other mattresses. I based my decision on the reviews. I read somewhere that it’s important to pump the mattress up and leave it inflated for a day without sitting or laying on it. It allows the materials to stretch and expand. Apparently it decreases the chance of it popping or breaking a seam. We had some friends stay with us a couple nights and it stayed perfectly inflated the entire time. We even had it sitting in the room for a couple of days after they left and it was still completely full of air. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Marieke

customer_reviews.title: Excellent air mattress
customer_reviews.text: Using daily for two months. Very happy. No deflation issues on a nightly basis at all and every few days it takes 5 seconds to flip a switch and put a little air in if I want. I can sit on the edge and put shoes on like it's a chair. Feels like a real bed. My weight is 280.
customer_reviews.author: Mom3

customer_reviews.title: So far so good! It's been about 21 days since I bought ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! It's been about 21 days since I bought this, it has been used for all 21 nights and it is holding up pretty good. Very firm, doesn't loose any air. It is super simple to set up and even simpler to put away. Takes about 3-4 minutes to inflate a bit longer to deflate. No complaints thus far.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: Left this thing blown up for a week with lots of blankets and a layer of memory foam on it, and didnt have to add any air to it at all. Currently using as a normal bed for 3 weeks til I finish moving, and it is the best air matress ever.
customer_reviews.author: Clint

customer_reviews.title: Get it, you will 😍
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these for a birthday slumber party And my guest were happily sleeping.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Finally a good blow up mattress without spending hundreds of dollars
customer_reviews.text: Finally a good blow up mattress without spending hundreds of dollars! This was easy to blow up and stayed fully inflated all night long. Also surprisingly comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: No leakage, but still failing
customer_reviews.text: Edit: It's been a couple weeks. The support beam where the pillow is just split apart. Was sitting on it, and hear a rip. There's no leakage, but I'd think twice about getting this if it's already failing less than a week of owning it. Had for about a week. So far it's good. No leakage, and family member staying for the summer seems to be enjoying it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a temporary bed until my mattress got delivered. This is the best air mattress I've ever slept on! Give it a few tries until it stretches out, and then refill with air. The motor pump sounds like a vacuum cleaner, so nothing too loud. Very sturdy!!
customer_reviews.author: Minnow

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, but started leaking after a few weeks.
customer_reviews.text: It's a great concept, and really comfortable when it's not leaking. It sprung a leak somewhere for no reason while my mom was using it in my spare room, and she ended up on the floor in the morning. This would be a great product if it would last longer than just a few weeks!
customer_reviews.author: Phunster

customer_reviews.title: You Won't Be Disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: I've only used it for one guest so far who slept on it for a week but so far so good. It never lost air, was comfortable, easy to set up and put away, stores easily. No complaints. It was cold when I first tried it out so I put a sleeping bag and a cotton quilt under the fitted sheet which provided sufficient insulation. Very pleased with it so far.
customer_reviews.author: MPB

customer_reviews.title: This is very comfortable to sleep on just do not overfill it because ...
customer_reviews.text: This is very comfortable to sleep on just do not overfill it because if you do and you slide off of a corner and the air pressure goes into one of the cells it will pop in and turn into a bubble ball. You must be careful and gentle yet use as little as possible as it does have thin material I believe as the one that I received in April is already leaking air. There is no way to contact The seller after the 30 days and now it is garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Thankful

customer_reviews.title: After 4 night of it going flat we are sending it back.
customer_reviews.text: We slept on the air mattress for 4 nights and the first night was just as bad as the last with it just leaking air. I know the company says that the mattress will leak for a day or so but it never got better. We would have to blow it up at least two times a night and still wake up with it half filled up. I wanted to like it but we are going to send it back after it performing so badly.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley McCabe

customer_reviews.title: Great price and extremely comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for a girl's sleepover party and it was extremely comfortable. We've only used it once but so far there have been no holes and no problems inflating it. It inflates very quickly and I like that you can have it as soft or as firm as you would like it. I like how it is far off of the ground so you don't feel like you're sleeping right on the floor. The top material is very soft to the touch and I would definitely buy this product again and it's definitely coming along with us on our summer trips.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Does not hold air overnight.
customer_reviews.text: When fully blown up the mattress is awesome, very comfortable and very good quality. However, as with many other reviews (which I ignored thinking maybe I will get a good unit) it does not hold air. I had family in town and pulled this out for them. Each morning it was half deflated. I made sure the pump dial was in the correct position before the second night, but still deflated. it would be a great air mattress if it did its job of holding air. Returned for money back. Do not ignore reviews as I did, they are all correct, it does not hold air. My guess is the air pump is faulty, and leaks through there.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmie Birley

customer_reviews.title: Comfy Air Bed!
customer_reviews.text: Has been such a lifesaver when friends and family decide to stay over. Only issue I have is that it loses a bit of air overnight. Not sure if it's just because of the way the pump is set once it's full or the pressure, but for the most part it's comfortable, stays inflated, and people get a good night's sleep.
customer_reviews.author: shellbell

customer_reviews.title: A great inflatable airbed
customer_reviews.text: After trying several other inflatables over the years, this one hands down is the best. First, it holds its air and doesn't leak. Second, it is very comfortable. It includes a built in pump so all you have to do is plug it in and turn it on until it is firm. Take down is just as easy and simple. When it came time to put it away, I was weary that it would be a mess, but it deflated quickly and neatly and there were folding instructions that actually enabled it to easily fit in the carry bag. I was pleasantly surprised. if you need an inflatable bed, this is a great choice.
customer_reviews.author: J. Brannon

customer_reviews.title: Broke after just a few uses, only "90 day warranty" - what a waste for environment
customer_reviews.text: Intex should be ashamed of themselves for designing poor quality products and only backing them with a 90 day warranty. This item stopped working (won't inflate, switch won't even turn on) after just a few uses indoors. Now its going to go to the landfill because they apparently are so slimy that they only offer a 90-day warranty? REALLY? Most companies do a minimum of 1 year. Enjoy your $40 bucks you losers. And thanks for contributing to more waste in the garbage. You lost a customer for life.
customer_reviews.author: Smith

customer_reviews.title: VERY COMFORTABLE, STABLE, HIGHLY RECOMMEND.
customer_reviews.text: We have slept on this bed for two (2) nights now, and everything was GREAT, very comfortable, very little air lost even on the 1st night. If we have any problems, we will update this review in the next 30 days. FYI, this is our 2nd Dura-Beam bed (the 1st bed was used 24/7 for over 7 months during surgeries) and we added air maybe 3 times in 18 mos. I have a 4" memory foam atop the bed, and the sleep is MOST comfortable. HIGHLY RECOMMEND, SPEEDY DELIVERY, EXCELLENT PRODUCTS.
customer_reviews.author: Grandpa

customer_reviews.title: Good for three uses
customer_reviews.text: This bed was great! For three uses. We used twice in homes and one time out camping and all three times it held air, was firm, easy to set up and easy to tear down. And then, on the fourth time, it stopped holding air. We searched for a leak and found nothing, so we don’t know why it isn’t holding air. We used the mattress per the instructions the first time (blowing it up and letting it sit) and took care of it every time after. And yet... here we sit. On the ground, because our mattress lost its air. Cool.
customer_reviews.author: Brianne Curtis

customer_reviews.title: Works well.
customer_reviews.text: This mattress inflates quickly, holds air well and is reasonably comfortable. We used it when we were moving and had no furniture for a while. I read about others having air holding issues and considered more expensive air mattresses, but ultimately this mattress has worked as well as I could hope for. The manufacturer informs you the mattress may appear to lose air at first due to initial stretching. I did not find that to happen. Good product.
customer_reviews.author: W. Ball

customer_reviews.title: Holds its air!
customer_reviews.text: Before I bought this air mattress, I've gone through a couple of other major-named mattresses with built-in inflators and been VERY disappointed - they just don't hold their air, sagging me to the ground by the end of the night. Even with a "maintenance inflator", it just ... doesn't. I bought this Intex on a whim, desperate for any mattress that would hold up, and it ... did! I can recommend this air mattress with full confidence that it will work better than you expect.
customer_reviews.author: Edwin Wise

customer_reviews.title: Won’t stay inflated
customer_reviews.text: Just won’t stay inflated. I wake up every two hours with my back/butt on the floor and mattress pillowed up around me. Very frustrating. Returning it.
customer_reviews.author: K-ride

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and good quality
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and comfort for the price. Used it while traveling out of the country. Was used by four or three people on a daily basis including an infant and a toddler who tend to move a lot and jump. Did not deflate only as described in description for stretching and only needed to be inflated again once. I would recommend to others. Total use of time was 3 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Gracie

customer_reviews.title: Great, quiet motor, very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Very quiet motor fills and empties quickly. I like that the cap is non-removable, and the power cord tuck inside a little compartment. the cap is just a dial that spins one way or the other - very clever. That said, if the motor ever breaks, we won't be able to inflate the bed. We also bought the twin size, and it seems a little bit "tippy" from side to side when fully inflated. Our twin sized Coleman is more stable. The bag is a bit big and a little flimsy, I will probably pick up nylon stuff sacks at some point in the future. However, a kid would find them easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: D. Ryan

customer_reviews.title: After 3 months of having this it started leaking and ...
customer_reviews.text: After 3 months of having this it started leaking and not holding air attempted to gorilla glue where the leak was around the pump and still didn't hold air.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value, reasonable quality
customer_reviews.text: I hope it lasts. I used it over the Thanksgiving holiday when my Mom was visiting so she could use my bed. Overall this air mattress was comfortable and didn't lose too much air. I topped it off every other day or so. Overall happy with the unit. It helped to put a comforter on it as a pad and insulation. The comforter kept the vinyl from being cold which helped me sleep better.
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: awesome!
customer_reviews.text: picked this up incase anyone wanted to crash at our house over night after a party or something, or when my sister stays over. works awesome. blows in in a minute, and goes down flat in a few minutes. holds air perfect. really well made. is actually quite comfortable! the "headrest" keeps you from going over the end of it. really love this thing. for the price cant beat it.
customer_reviews.author: mitsuevors

customer_reviews.title: My hopes we're deflated, just like the bed.
customer_reviews.text: The bed blows up and blows down wonderfully. However, no matter what I did it did not want to stay inflated for the entire night. Every morning I would wake up and it would be partially deflated. I used it the day I got it and for about three weeks. I'm disappointed in it. My friend had one I slept on that worked wonderfully, so I'm not sure why mine isn't as wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick B.

customer_reviews.title: The side seam tore. :(
customer_reviews.text: I had this for only a few months (I bought it because my friend had one and it was quite comfortable). It was only used indoors (no outdoors/camping usage) during the week that I waited for my real mattress to be delivered...I had only slept on it a handful of times. There's a side seam where the brand logo/name is and it seemed to slice apart... i tried to fix it with several types of "patches/glues" and yet the seam opened wider, so now I cannot use it at all....air will only keep it filled/usable for about 15 minutes... Sad. :(
customer_reviews.author: wendy jagger

customer_reviews.title: Only used it twice. Ended up on the floor halfway through the night both times
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband and I for camping. I have only used it twice in the two years I have had it and it deflated both times :( . It is really comfortable when it first gets inflated but loses the air half way through the night. You wake up almost on the ground. I don't know if we got a dud mattress or what?!? I've always heard good things about Intex products. But I don't recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: The Fisherman's Wife

customer_reviews.title: Great & portable
customer_reviews.text: I needed a air mattress to ship to the east coast for my kids and it arrived quickly. In a nice fitted box. The mattress is sturdy. I like that the mattress has a air pump built in. If the pressure goes down you can just turn it on and it inflated quickly. The mattress does not smell like plastic which is great. I had to buy a mattress cover to place it on since at night I felt it cold but other than that it’s a good mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Mommyov5

customer_reviews.title: Great air mattress
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for a family member and this air mattress is wonderful. The built-in charger makes it easy to inflate in just a few minutes, quicker than other air beds with a standard pump. The height is as tall as a regular queen size bed set. Mattress is firm and stayed inflated without air loss through the night.
customer_reviews.author: RMB1

customer_reviews.title: Started to leak within 10 days of use
customer_reviews.text: The mattress itself is comfortable; the raised end that creates a "pillow" was nice as well. I really like that you simply flip a switch at the end of the mattress to inflate it rather than attach a hose; etc. However; even with careful use it was flat the morning of the 10th day of using it. We have tried all sorts of ways to find the source of the leak with no luck. I wanted this to work so bad. But I have to question the integrity of the material used or the making of it at least.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly B

customer_reviews.title: So impressed, we now have 2
customer_reviews.text: Took it camping right out of the box. Had no issues. In fact, it inflates and deflates more efficiently than our older version of the exact mattress. So it has been improved. We will be moving soon and these will be our temporary beds during our move.
customer_reviews.author: J. R. Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: I use this air mattress all the time as I travel to other friends quite a bit. The inflation is quick and easy and I love that the cord stores back into the compartment of the mattress. Way easier than lugging around an air pump than most have. I have not had any issues with tears or holes, it has been quite durable. After a night spent on it, I do feel like it loses air a little and I sink down a little bit, but not horrible.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable air mattress
customer_reviews.text: We have been very impressed with this air mattress! We are renting an unfurnished house, and needed an air mattress to sleep on for 14 nights until our bed was delivered. This air mattress is 20 inches high, so it sits pretty high off the floor. It is very comfortable. It does not lose air after the two day break-in period. It is easy to inflate with the built-in pump. It does take two days of full inflation to stretch before it does not lose air overnight, so you must top it off with the pump before going to bed for the first two nights. We highly recommend this air mattress!
customer_reviews.author: Arthur E.

customer_reviews.title: Sleepovers haven't had complaints
customer_reviews.text: Everyone likes this when they sleep over. It fits great in a tent, obviously put it in the tent THEN inflate. It's actually super comfy, and you can get down on it- with no worries. Only issue is, you need electricity- due to the built in pump. So unless you have some of that with you camping, this isn't the one for you.
customer_reviews.author: Lulu | Danny

customer_reviews.title: Self deflate valve!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great air mattress. It's not for outdoor use. It inflates quickly and didn't lose air over a course of a week with both children and adults sleeping on it. The self deflating valve is probably my favorite part, no more rolling and squishing to get the air out. It deflates nearly all the air and allows for quick and easy fold up and put away.
customer_reviews.author: pk

customer_reviews.title: It Inflates in 3 Minutes & is Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Needed extra bed for company and this was perfect fit! Auto inflate in 3 mins, flocked top and built in headrests, plus it stands 16" above the floor for ease of getting up and down. Our guests got cold under a down comforter and flannel sheets so a thick pad under bottom sheet may be a good idea in the Winter months. Instructions suggest adding air after it has stretched a bit. Not a problem with easy controls.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Great Afforable Air Bed
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this item for guest. Slept on it myself to test it out, before subjecting loved ones to a night on an air bed. I slept wonderfully. It maintained its firmness through the night. I do suggest, if its not on carpet, placing a blanket under it. The air of the bed got a bit cool. I have a terrible back, but woke with no pain or stiffness that wasn't my usual. I recommend this affordable air bed to anyone. The built in pump is a handy feature.
customer_reviews.author: RockHunters

customer_reviews.title: Great quality mattress
customer_reviews.text: Very comfy...we took.this camping and I got.the best sleep! Its on the taller side so be prepared and take your measurements carefully. All in all great mattress easy to use...blows up fast and deflates just as well. Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: This really exceeded my expectations. We ended up needing this for use over a few weeks when we moved across the country, and really put it through tons of use and it's incredibly well made for the price. It's comfortable, easy to inflate, stays inflated, and the built in pillow thing is nice. It's nice and high off the ground, and if you can't put sheets on it the top covering is soft. Seriously great value, and was a life saver for us.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Powell

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful bed. Until it stops being so 🤕
customer_reviews.text: When it’s too full it kinda hurts to sleep on. I haven’t filled it back up in over 2 weeks and we sleep just fine now. Throw a mattress topper on it and it feels like a regular mattress. *****update. It’s been less than 2 months since I’ve had this bed and now it’s deflating at a ridiculously fast rate. You can literally feel it and Hear it deflating. We now have to get up 2-3 times each night to fill it back up. ***** Ok a few days later and now the pump isnt working. Last night we literally slept on the floor. The bed was empty and now I have to order a replacement :(
customer_reviews.author: Layza

customer_reviews.title: Great product. No problems.
customer_reviews.text: Me and my husband have used this bed every night for a month now. No air loss. No problems. Haven’t had to add any air too it. Make sure you lock the pump. We had 2 intenx deluxe before. They both popped and lost air.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Osburn

customer_reviews.title: Leaked after three uses, avoid this item.
customer_reviews.text: This mattress developed a leak after only 3 uses. Do not purchase this air mattress. It is way to expensive for the quality of the mattress. The warranty is also very short. Many people use air mattresses for guests, so they see infrequent use. It worked great the first two uses, but the uses are infrequent so the warranty expired well before that third leaky use. I repeat, do no purchase this air mattress. Save your money and buy a cheaper one.
customer_reviews.author: Hike

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and easy setup/takedown.
customer_reviews.text: We took the Dura-Beam pillowtop air mattress on a few trips and love it. Easy to transport (surprised how little space it occupies) and set up. This sits higher than the traditional mattress and does NOT flatten on the edges like so many others. Very, very comfortable and stayed firm. Considering buying another.
customer_reviews.author: JenB

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware!!!
customer_reviews.text: First, make sure it has the options you want it to have! Because if you don’t and order it and have to send it back, GET THIS!!!! you have to pay them to take it back, even if all you did was open the box. I didn’t even take the mattress out! Brand new! They can resell it and get the full price for it!! But I get a $28 refund. 😑
customer_reviews.author: liz

customer_reviews.title: Kids like it.
customer_reviews.text: Kids like it. They use it every weekend when they want to fall asleep in front of the TV. And that is what we bought it for.
customer_reviews.author: fbagent

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Slept on this for 4 weeks this summer. So comfortable, I had no issues with it at all. Never even needed to add air to it after the initial night. I have a really bad back and this was not too bad for an air mattress. I am looking forward to taking it camping with me.
customer_reviews.author: AmazinMom4

customer_reviews.title: It shouldn't deflate.
customer_reviews.text: So I've had this mattress for about a year and it says to use it a few times before it'll keep the air. Well the few times are over and within a half hour the air is gone. There are no holes and the switch is in the correct position. I'm super frustrated because now it's too late to return it and I've used it 4 times and have to purchase another one.
customer_reviews.author: ABG

customer_reviews.title: Odd shape when iflated
customer_reviews.text: I hated laying on this. It doesn't blow up into a nice shape. Almost like it holds too much air in the middle and you feel like you will fall off the sides. - we tried many different air fills, believe me. Also the inflatable part started to fail within the first month and we would wake up on the floor. Wouldn't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Sondra Mortier

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Bought this December 2018. Very easy to blow up and deflate. Have had several guests say it's comfortable and they love the way it feels. BUT, in October 2019, I tried inflating an hour before a guest arrived and it no longer worked. Luckily my local Target was open till midnight and I was able to buy another bed quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Troy Boy

customer_reviews.title: Used 10x or less, & popped.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this last summer, & set it up about 9-10 mos ago, in my guest room. Its been used maybe 10x or less, & it already popped & deflated. It was great until then.. very easy to set up. But i feel it should be more durable & last much longer! Im very disappointed that I now have to replace it after such little use. I’ll be purchasing another brand.
customer_reviews.author: TinK

customer_reviews.title: bed only lasted 1 month
customer_reviews.text: Within a month the bed's seams started leaking air. Our teen would go to sleep on inflated bed and wake up in the morning on the floor. I had this bed on a carpet in spare bedroom. It was used on weekends only. I'm giving it 2 stars instead of 1 b/c it arrived on time packaging was good. easy to inflate and fairly comfortable for an air mattress. little 2 inch topper was perfectly fine for our weekend teen.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey Crispino

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy it
customer_reviews.text: It is cheap and got a hole in it the first night. I bought tape to fix it but it developed new holes. I replaced it with the same model and the second one lasted 2 days longer. I shipped them both back and purchased a more heavy duty one. To top it off, after I sent the two back I wanted my payment for the first returned. Instead amazon sent me out a third. I DON"T WANT THIS PIECE of Garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Ervin Wegscheid

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. I have a bad back and it didn't make it worse. It was actually quite pleasant to sleep on. My fiances uncle even slept on it for a week during a family trip and loved it. Would highly recommend. Easy to set up and take down too. Great for using indoors or with an outlet.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: WORTH EVERY PENNY
customer_reviews.text: Those is the best air mattress I’ve ever had! First of all the pump is build in and discreet which is super nice! It’s easy to fill and it’s not flat when you wake up. It’s siper comfort table as well! I had my younger brother visit and he was sleeping on it for a few days and was surprised at how comoftoable and blend big it was!
customer_reviews.author: Sierra

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased this one before and decided to buy it again. The built-in pump makes it easy to air up and deflate in minutes and it is also comfortable and doesn't lose air easily. Lasts for a long time if you take care of it. Very affordable and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Jameson

customer_reviews.title: TERRIBLE PRODUCT!!
customer_reviews.text: It only lasts like five months. In the beginning, it looked good, but it used to lose air quickly. I thought it was okay, but it keeps happening all the time. After that, the plastic began to have little holes and ripped in any other place. Terrible. I bought this thinking I could use it for a long time...
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy. It sucks.
customer_reviews.text: It says that it needs to be filled repeatedly in beginning til it stretches out and then will hold the air. FALSE. Worst air mattress ever. Might as well sleep on a deflating balloon. I refilled this thing twice a day for 5 days with NO ONE sleeping on it and it was still completely flat the next day. Worthless and being returned.
customer_reviews.author: A. McCormick

customer_reviews.title: DID NOT STAY INFLATED
customer_reviews.text: I only used this mattress one night and because I didn't use it as soon as I bought it it is past the 90 day warranty. I read the instructions to inflate and let it sit as there might be stretch to the mattress (I have never had any issue with other air mattresses) so I did. It lost air or appeared to have lost air so I inflated it again. It continues to lose air. I will not ever recommend this Air Mattress to anyone. I am very disappointed as I have bought cheaper mattresses at Walmart that lasted better than this one. Guess I better head to Walmart to get another air mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Lanouette

customer_reviews.title: didn't hold up against leaks as i thought it should ...
customer_reviews.text: didn't hold up against leaks as i thought it should. it comes with a repair kit, but not enough to plug all the leaks that developed....and those were the ones i could find!!?!?!? most were on the seams. two were in the ribs. some day i'll soapy water it and plug em all for a camping mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Glynn

customer_reviews.title: The product was leaking from the very first day. ...
customer_reviews.text: The product was leaking from the very first day. We had to pump air every 5 or 6th days. We were living with that. Yesterday night around 2.30 am we found our-self drowning inside due to air leak. We woke up and re-pumped again, only to woke up again around 3.00 am due to same problem (drowning due to air leak). We had sleep on the floor rest of the night. This morning we tried to find the leak (to patch, if possible); could not find the leak; later, drained the air out, and do not know what to do with it. :/
customer_reviews.author: Mohammad Shafinul Haque

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: We use this for sleepovers. It goes up & deflates well/easily. Sometimes we feel like maybe it's lost some air at night, but nothing bad. It's held up well, though it's not used extremely frequently, nor does it take too much of a beating. My biggest complaint is that the bag it stores in isn't as high quality as I'd wish. It got caught on something & ripped so we had to duct tape the hole.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price, but not the most comfortable air mattress
customer_reviews.text: This air mattress gets the job done but it isn't the most comfortable for me. If you don't mind spending the extra money, worth it to get a more expensive air mattress with better comfort. Then again, you can't beat the price on this. I'd recommend getting a mattress pad if you choose to buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Rochen

customer_reviews.title: Letting it inflate and deflate then letting it sit for a few hours blown up before sleeping on it
customer_reviews.text: I only got this air mattress yesterday but wanted to go ahead and post a review. I bought this for my sister and her husband and they said it was perfectly comfortable. it didn’t loose any air through out the night. We blew it up twice to stretch it out and deflated it as well. Then we blew it back up and it sat for a few hours before they slept on it. So as of right now I am giving this bed 5 STARS!!
customer_reviews.author: Megan Clancy

customer_reviews.title: Great, affordable mattress
customer_reviews.text: Great, affordable mattress! No problems with holes or oddly shape when I aired it up. The only reason I gave it a 4 star is because I didn't prefer the built in pillow, hurt my neck over time had to turn it around for more comfort. Over all good quality for the price! :-)
customer_reviews.author: Jacklyn Villanueva

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and easy to setup / tear down
customer_reviews.text: I used this over the 4th it was easy to setup and take down. I found it comfortable and it didn’t deflate a little at night. When you need to deflate it there is a knob that you turn left and hit a switch and it quickly deflated the whole bed in 2 min or less. It was easy to roll up and put in storage bag.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: where other brands do a better job st keeping their inflation
customer_reviews.text: Air mattress was uncomfortable, and didn’t stay inflated well. I constantly had to refil it, every day, or every other day, where other brands do a better job st keeping their inflation. I would not repurchase.
customer_reviews.author: mynomadlyfe

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress !!
customer_reviews.text: Nice mattress ! First on wouldn't stay inflated. Was replaced quickly and no issues or hassles with the replacement. Intended use was for camping but it sleeps so well we just use it at home. Have been sleeping on it since purchased with no issues. It is sturdy and comfortable. Can't beat it when compared with prices of other brands. Will order another one for the tent and just keep this one at home.
customer_reviews.author: BTJames

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal
customer_reviews.text: I was very impressed with this blow up bed. I started off looking at the more expensive beds as we wanted something that would not deflate over night and that would be comfy to use on occasion when we have guests. I decided to go with this because I could not make my mind up and quite honestly did not want to spend $80+ on a blow up bed. I was surprised that this bed was used for a whole week and did not need to be re-inflated once. It was super comfy too! Highly recommend. This bed is just as good (or better!) as any of the other more expensive beds we have bought in the past. Do it!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Miller

customer_reviews.title: Had to return
customer_reviews.text: Had to end up returning because the bed was constantly losing air. There is a notice in the box saying that the bed isn't leaking air, it's just stretching, but this was happening for more than a week and too much air was leaking out for it to be "stretching".
customer_reviews.author: pangie671

customer_reviews.title: Durable & comfortable, easy to inflate/deflate
customer_reviews.text: Had to use while “returning” my old mattress & the pups & I slept great while on it. I was pleasantly impressed with the durability & comfort of the mattress & it’s always nice to have, especially such a handy one. Very easy to inflate & deflate.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t hold up.
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to setup. That is the good part. However, I had 2 average sized adults sleeping on it and after the first night it began leaking air. It just would not hold. Only got one good night out of the mattress then it was basically like they were sleeping on floor. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Lee Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love that this one is so comfortable. It does have a headrest, but I would still use a pillow. It inflates and deflates itself with the push of a button. Just turn the knob to change between inflate and deflate. It fills up pretty quickly also. Feels durable and just survived a week. Stayed inflated every night. No sinking in during the middle of the night.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel

customer_reviews.title: WON'T BUY IT AGAIN
customer_reviews.text: IT IS ATTRACTIVE WITH PRICE AND SO ON BUT LASTS FOR 2-3 MONTHS I BOUGHT 2 OF THEM AND FIASCO WITH BOTH OF THEM STARTING LOOSING AIR WARRANTY COVERAGE ONLY 3 MONTHS (US CONSUMER REGULATIONS DEMANDS 12 MONTHS)
customer_reviews.author: ASTOR

customer_reviews.title: best quality and price!
customer_reviews.text: This bed is awesome! My husband and I have been using it for weeks now as we transition and move to a new apartment. It is firm and comfy and the self blow up feature is so convenient. I cant believe the quality of the bed for the price. if you're looking for a comfy, durable, convenient blow up bed for a good price look no further!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loses air even after a month of use
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd Intex air matress i have purchased and its a different model. This one loses air fairly quickly though. Ive done the whole let it stretch thing and have had it for about a month and a half. We have guests often and sometimes air needs to be added in to it in the middle of the night.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product I've been buying it for years!
customer_reviews.text: This is the bed I always buy. It is easy to inflate and deflate. You can decide how firm you want the mattress. I suffer from fibromyalgia, arthritis and degenerative disc disease so getting comfortable is difficult, a normal mattress just doesn't work and I can't afford one of those number beds so this is what I use. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Alixendriss

customer_reviews.title: Real comfort
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for a church sleepover with my girl's youth group. I had to constantly run them off my air mattress because they didn't want to sleep on their sleeping bags. It was very firm and comfortable, I had no problem with the air escaping. Great product for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Shonufsaved

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality. Highly Recommend!!
customer_reviews.text: After looking through many air mattresses, this was the only one that really caught my eye. Right off the bat, I could tell it was good quality, just because how well made it looked. And I was right, it was very comfortable to sleep on, and the built in pump was very convenient. But, the most confident thing was how the air mattress could fully deflate it’s self. My old air mattress we had to wait days for all the air to get out, but this one you just open the valve and turn on the pump!
customer_reviews.author: Ben Esposito

customer_reviews.title: Not Ideal For Camping
customer_reviews.text: It was a great air mattress. Loved how easy and fast it was to blow up. After some use I noticed that it deflates pretty fast. Now when I blow it up at night, I wake up in the morning and it's uncomfortably low. This would be okay for a nightly use that's near an outlet which would be easy to pump back up, but I highly don't recommend this for weekend camping trips.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Ray

customer_reviews.title: Durable and comfy
customer_reviews.text: I specifically browsed for an Intex mattress since I previously had a great experience with this brand. My last inflatable mattress lasted 4yrs, using it 3-4x a week when I had guests. It would have lasted longer, but I think my Frenchie popped it (preferred this bed over his own). A little lower in height than expected though.
customer_reviews.author: yroman420

customer_reviews.title: It looks so much smaller than my previous one.
customer_reviews.text: I Purchased the exact same mattress in April 2019 and it was deflating numerous times throughout the night and so I purchased another one to replace it and it seems more like a full and not a queen. It looks so much smaller than my previous one
customer_reviews.author: roamieboy

customer_reviews.title: It's ok
customer_reviews.text: Easy to inflate with built in pump. It is hard, so if you like a hard mattress, you will like it, if you like soft, then you will hate it. It takes awhile to deflate as there is no quick release valve.
customer_reviews.author: Travis

customer_reviews.title: was great initially.
customer_reviews.text: was great initially...used it a few times...now it wont stay inflated...my kids were on it last and may have jumped on it...probably has a whole now..
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: This was a nice air mattress to have when you have company spending ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a nice air mattress to have when you have company spending a week or more. I wish I had tested it when I purchased it because it slowly deflates. Always check your purchases even if you're not going to use it right away. Now it's too late to have it exchanged. I might have been given one that was malfunctioned. Oh well :(
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette

customer_reviews.title: Great price! Bad sleep for 2!
customer_reviews.text: Kept feeling like my wife and I were gonna roll off the bed! Very hard to find the right amount of air
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Awful.
customer_reviews.text: These looked great online but when we got them and inflated them they were terrible. You seriously couldn't move on them without nearly falling off of it. (Yes they were properly inflated) After we threw them out, I went to Walmart and bought a different kind for $19.95 and they were a ton better.
customer_reviews.author: Zodiac Talon

customer_reviews.title: Sleep on air!
customer_reviews.text: My husband has a bad back and says this is better to sleep on. So far he is happy with it. I find it comfortable too but it is very difficult to put sheets on. I bought a queen size but regular queen sheets are a little too small. I really had to stretch the get them on
customer_reviews.author: Topper

customer_reviews.title: Does not stay inflated
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to buy this product because of the reviews, but my friend has bought two and her second one stays inflated so I decided to give it a try. I followed the directions and have blown it up a few times to allow it to stretch, but it still slowly deflates. It does not even stay fully inflated for a full nights sleep. I tried to call the customer service number that is listed and it is not a working number. Pretty disappointed at this point.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: I will always buy this kind from now on.
customer_reviews.text: We have one of these with and without a built in air compressor and this one, by far, is the easiest, most convenient air matress I've ever owned! ALWAYS BUY ONE WITH A BUILT IN AIR COMPRESSOR! And btw...it is still flawless after putting up with a 4, 7 and 10 yr old!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for sleepovers
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 2, one for my sister and one for me. Used for sleepover with grandchildren...Worked GREAT
customer_reviews.author: KT

customer_reviews.title: great for folks staying overnight
customer_reviews.text: This bed fills up in less time than it takes me to brew my single serve coffee. It is comfortable for my guests to enjoy an overnight stay. My house is small so it's important that this bed folds away to store for future use.
customer_reviews.author: Letha Seals

customer_reviews.title: Intex air mattress
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for company. It inflated quickly and while it needs a little air, it's has taken it several days to become "squishy". No one has slept on it yet.
customer_reviews.author: AZMA

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and seems durable
customer_reviews.text: I like Intex as a general rule. I blew this up as soon as I got it, and left it in my dining room for three days. It retained air without having to blow it up again. As of now, my only issue with the bed is that it only comes with ac power. I have to buy a converter so that I can blow it up when I go camping using my car.
customer_reviews.author: Yismo

customer_reviews.title: Exeptional product for the price
customer_reviews.text: The size of this air mattress is impressive. Purchased it for when relatives from out of town stay overnight with us. Also purchased a new King size mattress online for our bed at same time and needed something to sleep on while it went thru recommemded 24 hour expansion. This air mattress could be a primary mattress it is so comfortable,
customer_reviews.author: Albert Scherer

customer_reviews.title: It's ok
customer_reviews.text: We didn't pay alot for this (which was the point). It's ok, we only use it when my sister is in town, but I wouldn't want to sleep on it honestly. It's not particularly comfortable and I can't imagine having two people on it.
customer_reviews.author: MT406

customer_reviews.title: For the first 3 weeks it was pretty good, but hoping this doesn't happen again
customer_reviews.text: Built in pump blows this up very quickly BUT after 3 weeks of using it, my guest said during the night it started to lose air. She didn't want to turn it on to add more because it's very noisy once it's on. For the first 3 weeks it was pretty good, but hoping this doesn't happen again.
customer_reviews.author: Shayn

customer_reviews.title: Wow!! Great for Price
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this to help with all the company coming in for the holidays. We were a little hesitant if the quality would be as described. IT IS!! For the price this air mattress is worth its value and more!! The carry bag is perfect , and it actually fits in it without to much hassle. The air bed itself is comfortable and the height makes it east to get on and off. Would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kerryanna Durrence

product_meta.title: Intex Dura-Beam Standard Series Deluxe Pillow Rest Raised Airbed w/ Soft Flocked Top for Comfort, Built-in Pillow & Electric Pump, Bed Height 16.5", Queen
product_meta.description: Part of the new dura-beam standard series of airbeds, the deluxe pillow rest raised airbed now features an interior made with Intex innovative fiber-tech construction which is comprised of thousands of high-strength polyester fibers that provide enhanced comfort, stability and support. With its luxuriously soft, flocked top, this queen airbed is an amazing solution for overnight guests. The built-in electric pump plugs right into your standard wall outlet and inflates the bed in about 3 minutes so there is no need to rummage through the garage for your old electric pump or fuss with tiring hand or foot pumps. This deluxe 64135e also features a perimeter frame that's helps add stability, support, and comfort. Plus, you don't have to break out extra pillows since it features a built-in pillow rest as well.
feature_bullets: Inflatable queen airbed for home use engineered with fiber-tech(tm) construction
Built-In, high-powered electric pump for hassle-free inflation and deflation, inflates mattress in approximately 3 minutes to the desired firmness
There's no need for extra pillows with the built-in pillow and an outer perimeter frame provides additional stability and comfort
Dimensions: 60 x 16.5 X 80 inches (w x h x l), 600-pound capacity
Duffel bag included for easy storage and transport

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
